creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
description: Braided-net fringe with tassels, cloth band. Black wool ground with polychrome silk embroidery. The edges are trimmed with a band of silk cross stitch embroidery on a cotton ground. There is an attached braided silk fringe with wrapped cotton and silk tassels. The embroidery is presently hand stitched to a fabric covered mount. the verso is not visible. Ikat strip at top.
title: Ilgich
